__e: We must finish the picture with you as Leonard and me...as me!
My name's Leonard and I don't know if there's anything that complicated about me.
I got no issue with you being a lawyer, Leonard.
You're still innocent, Leonard, whether the world sees it that way or not.
I told Leonard we had nothing left.
Well, then do me a favor and tell Leonard that he can drop dead.
Dr. Leonard does indeed have a wife and son.
Please, Leonard! He said it's okay!
That's what Leonard said you'd say.
"Leonard is suspected of murdering the old lady I told you about."
Leonard just went over to the lad and he went crazy.
Yeah, and Leonard's mother's already here.
Leonard, I mean, you're not only the love of my life. I mean, you're my best friend, and you've got a friend in me.
"It doesn't matter if you're cool or not. Because I'm Penny, I'm pretty and I can do whatever I want."
You're not moving in, Leonard's not moving out, everything stays exactly the way it is.
Leonard popped the question and I said yes!
Oh, Leonard talked a lot about him.
Okay, okay, look, if this is about yesterday, Leonard... I am really sorry about what I said. I was just upset.
